title: The Diploma Disease (TEFC)
creator_credit: Ron Dore, Angela Little and Institute of Development Studies
brief_description: Educational credentials are increasingly required by employees and so education gives way to ritualised preparation for exams. The ideals of education are powerless against the pressure on schools in societies which have caught the “diploma disease”. Examines symptoms in Japan, Mexico, Sri Lanka, and Britain
